name: Up The Tree
description:
Tristan's first game, age 9.

Overview

The robots have taken over the power plant, which is a tree. Up the tree its so big, it can hold up metal. There's even labs in there. The robots have taken the power to use on themselves and the evil city. At the top most branch there is a room with a sapling with a computer next to it. The power from the sapling has been drained. When you get to the computer, talk to it to save the sapling and the tree!

Overview

Keyboard:

Arrow keys to move and climb

Z - Jump, talk, confirm

X - Shoot/bang bang!

Gameboy Rom

This game is made with GBStudio. A GameBoy is also provided for download. Enjoy!
